data.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium：LEGENDARY WINGS
data.detailed_description:
Add LEGENDARY WINGS to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

Humankind is on the verge of being wiped out by an alien supercomputer! With the Wings of Love and Courage from Ares, take flight to save humanity!

Players: 1-2 Player Co-Op
Genre: Shooter
Versions: Japanese & English
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Add LEGENDARY WINGS to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! Humankind is on the verge of being wiped out by an alien supercomputer! With the Wings of Love and Courage from Ares, take flight to save humanity!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 720P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
